content.name: Channel Surfing
content.description: The contestants engage the audience by enacting different TV channels and quickly switching between them.
rules: Participants must enact the channel given by the judges and should be able to adapt to a different channel spontaneously.
The participants will be judged on their tone, modification and style.
Any sort of vulgarity will lead to immediate disqualification.
No preparation time will be given.
Decision of the judges will be final and up for no  dispute.
Participants are given a time duration of 6 minutes (5+1).
